title: Split pea soup with sausage and pancetta
ingredients: ['2L water', '3 chicken or vegtable stock cubes', '500g green split peas', '1 celeraic, peeled and finely diced', '1 onion, finely chopped', '2 leeks, finely sliced', '3 stalks celery, finely chopped', '400g carrots, peeled and finely diced', '1 bunch parsley, chopped', '1 thick raw sausage, left whole', '1 smoked sausage, chopped or sliced', '200g pancetta cubes', 'salt and pepper, to taste']
